quettagram.name: quettagram
quettagram.desc: SI metric unit. Equal to 1000 [ronnagram] or 1ᴇ30 [gram]. Adopted 2022.

microgram.desc: SI metric unit. Equal to 1000 [nanogram] or 1ᴇ-6 [gram]. Adopted 1873.

nanogram.name: nanogram
